actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Agriculture.

official_title: A bill to amend the Food and Agriculture Act of 1977 relating to increases in the target prices of the 1980 crops of wheat, corn, and other crops under certain circumstances, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Agriculture Adjustment Act of 1980 - Amends the Food and Agriculture Act of 1977 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to increase the established price for the 1980 crops of: (1) wheat to $3.88 per bushel; and (2) corn to $2.51 per bushel. Sets October 1, 1980, as the effective date of this Act.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Food and Agriculture Act of 1977 relating to increases in the target prices of the 1980 crops of wheat, corn, and other crops under certain circumstances, and for other purposes.
